content:
• What set of Lean books/resources could serve as good substitute for the Software Foundations book series?
  • Is there a Discord server for Lean? The couple links I could find were expired

#tpil is probably the closest to software foundations. There is also #mil but it's more mathematics-focussed (in general my impression is that the community here is more mathematics-focussed than the Coq community).

I think @Martin Dvořák runs a Discord server for Lean.
#general > Discord server Lean 4 anarchy
Ende has marked this topic as resolved.
I’ll just add that the end of #fpil and some of the blog posts cover part of Vol 3 of software foundation
